LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Pocketwatch.label: Pocketwatch
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Pocketwatch.description: A charming little watch, useful for keeping time. Watches are difficult to make and hard to come by, so they sell for a good price.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_DeputySheriffBadge.label: Deputy Sheriff badge
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_DeputySheriffBadge.descripti: A town deputy sheriff's badge. This law enforcement badge gives the wearer an air of authority, as well as more confidence during gunfights.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_SheriffBadge.label: Sheriff badge
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_SheriffBadge.description: A town sheriff's badge. This law enforcement badge gives the wearer an air of authority, as well as more confidence during gunfights.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_DeputyMarshalBadge.label: Deputy U.S. Marshal badge
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_DeputyMarshalBadge.descripti: A Deputy U.S. Marshal's badge. Only issued to members of the U.S. Marshal Service, this law enforcement badge represents justice itself in the lawless lands of the frontier.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_ChiefMarshalBadge.label: Chief U.S. Marshal badge
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_ChiefMarshalBadge.descriptio: A Chief U.S. Marshal's badge. Worn only by the Chief U.S. Marshal, the head of the agency, this law enforcement badge represents justice itself in the lawless lands of the frontier.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Bandolier.label: bandolier
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Bandolier.description: Belt designed for carrying ammunition. Makes reloading firearms faster.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Chaps.label: holster belt with chaps
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Chaps.description: All the fastest shots wear these. Increases draw speed with guns.
